name: Shapeshifter (Skullhack)
description:
Made for my first game jam : Pot-au-jeu 2019 !

Theme was : "Metamorphosis".

Controls :

  • Q/D to move
  • Space to jump
  • Space to double jump (while in white form)
  • Up arrow to dash (while in red form)
  • Up arrow to grab (while in yellow form)
  • Left/Right arrow to circle through forms

You can also use a PS4 Controller, it's way easier.

Blue orb recover your double jump/dash/grab while mid-air.

White orb are anchor point for the grab, range is the white circle around it.

Thx for playing and sorry for the lack of level and menus !
